title: When I take Mordekaiser bot lane

replies.body:
I had an Taric + Morde bot lane.

I was Taric and someone else was Morde.

That lane was too much for the enemy team, they couldnt even gank us.
this makes me question my sexuality.
Pink Taric + Lord Mordekaiser skin(I prefer his Pentakill one) are a great combo xD
My friend was a Taric main before it was cool (he got level 5 mastery and then some before the Taric rework was revealed), and Morde is my most played bot laner. The synergy between the two is crazy.

You should try with a god Sona

http://img13.deviantart.net/483b/i/2014/293/e/4/pentakill_sona_by_anti_viirus-d83kcic.jpg

I always love a Sona in bot
https://media.giphy.com/media/taU6RaT2Aaxt6/giphy.gif

I have some good memories from playing Sion Morde Botlane with a RL friend of mine.
FeelsGoodMan.

Lol reminds me when I would take Udyr bot and my friend would take Darius and half the time he would just watch me solo them.
http://45.media.tumblr.com/4b8f37db24a3789a6ae7e7a68457699b/tumblr_n8itig5PAY1r3s8leo1_400.gif

Me and my friend are starting to take thresh and morde into ranked as a duo. God the cc and the damage make for a dangerous combo with lanterns to keep up or take off. Its honestly quite disgusting/beautiful at the same time.
